page.title: 10Leisure Activities
page.content: Chapel St Leonards is not a very big place.There is a few shops,arcades,a church and a fairground and a green. On the green they have a brass band every year.The band is Spilsby brass band.Mr Emerson the vicar aranges a fancy dress.The winner gets a pound and the losers get 10p.Usually they have stalls at this fancy dress.Last year Tommy Trinder came and told a few jokes.There are raffle prizes,stalls selling lacy things.Mr Emerson has a coffee evening at his house aswell where you can get coffee and toys.At Chapel Primary school they have a sport day where you can come and watch children racing and there is a toddlers race for toddlers and all the toddlers that take part get sweets.
